mapper.select: select store_number, store_title, store_content, store_date, store_price, store_view_cnt, store_like_cnt, h.hashtag_number, m.member_number, m.member_nickname from tbl_member m join tbl_store s on m.member_number = s.member_number join tbl_hashtag h on s.hashtag_number = h.hashtag_number where h.hashtag_number = #{hashtagNumber} order by store_view_cnt + store_like_cnt limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
